BackstoryDef.title: concord scientist
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: As part of a low priority field initiative, [PAWN_nameDef] studied non-Ascendancy cultures and biomes, extracting usable data and observing deviations from optimal social patterns. \nWhile not permitted to interfere, [PAWN_pronoun] occasionally "corrected" local behaviors in the name of stability. [PAWN_possessive] reports were precise. [PAWN_possessive] "empathy", artificial.
